name: 7 Wonders: Magical Mystery Tour
description: In an all-new 7 Wonders, you’ll take a fantastic journey to some of the most enchanting sites ever dreamed of. With a team of master builders, you’ll match colorful runes to collect the building blocks needed for Camelot, El Dorado, Atlantis, Shangri-La, and many others.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ Vista / 7 / 8 Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 241 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great little match 3 game with plenty of challenges as well as a zen mode. Very addictive with nice graphics beware you will lose all idea of time.   95/100

I bought this game to just have something to play to kill a few hours. This game is great for just that. It is interesting enough for a match 3 type game to let you kill some time and play through the 'campaign' for roughly 5 hours on normal. You can then always go back and replay, but I probably won't do that once I'm through.
